parameters.name: filterCriteria
parameters.description: The filter criteria. checkIdFilters (list) --- The criteria's check ID filters. (dict) --- The CIS string filter. The comparison value of the CIS string filter. The value of the CIS string filter. findingArnFilters (list) --- The criteria's finding ARN filters. findingStatusFilters (list) --- The criteria's finding status filters. (dict) --- The CIS finding status filter. The comparison value of the CIS finding status filter. The value of the CIS finding status filter. securityLevelFilters (list) --- The criteria's security level filters. Security level refers to the Benchmark levels that CIS assigns to a profile. (dict) --- The CIS security level filter. The CIS security filter comparison value. The CIS security filter value. titleFilters (list) --- The criteria's title filters. The value of the CIS string filter.
